title: Butternut squash, sausage and sage pasta
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '235g cubed butternut squash', '1 large onion, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '225g uncooked penne pasta', '225g turkey sausages, sliced', '4 tablespoons double cream', '2 teaspoons dried sage', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (optional)']
